com.dropbox.core.examples.web_file_browser

Class FormProtection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dropbox.core.examples.web_file_browser.FormProtection

  • public class FormProtection
extends java.lang.Object
    Placeholders for protection against CSRF and UI Redress. The protection isn't actually implemented -- see TODOs below.
